existing_features.title: Prepare and execute a production deployment for Version 30 to the Internet Computer mainnet, ensuring the deployed production canisters (backend + frontend) are accessible via the mainnet canister URLs and are not subject to draft expiration.

Update `frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md` to include a clear, end-to-end section for promoting an already-working version (Version 30) to production, including prerequisites (cycles), the exact command(s) to deploy to `--network ic`, and a brief note explaining that production deployments do not expire unlike drafts.
